All Packages

Package Summary
Package
Description
nom.tam.fits
The core classes of nom-tam-fits.
nom.tam.fits.compress
(for internal use) Handling of compressed FITS files (file-level compression only).
nom.tam.fits.compression.algorithm.api
Common interface definitions for the various compression algorithms (primarily for internal use) .
nom.tam.fits.compression.algorithm.gzip
(for internal use) GZIP compression algorithms.
nom.tam.fits.compression.algorithm.gzip2
( for internal use) GZIP2 compression algorithms.
nom.tam.fits.compression.algorithm.hcompress
The HCompress algorithm and its options.
nom.tam.fits.compression.algorithm.plio
(for internal use) PLIO compression algorithm.
nom.tam.fits.compression.algorithm.quant
Quantization support for representing floating-point values with integers corresponding to discrete levels.
nom.tam.fits.compression.algorithm.rice
The Rice comppression algorithm and its options.
nom.tam.fits.compression.algorithm.uncompressed
( for internal use) Compression algorithm, for non compressing at all.
nom.tam.fits.compression.provider
(for internal use) Finding the right compression classes for every occasion.
nom.tam.fits.compression.provider.api
(for internal use) Defines an interface for looking up compression algorithms.
nom.tam.fits.compression.provider.param.api
(for internal use) The basics of storing compression options in FITS headers and compressed table columns.
nom.tam.fits.compression.provider.param.base
(for internal use) Base implementations of the interfaces that manage compression parameters for the various algorithms.
nom.tam.fits.compression.provider.param.hcompress
(for internal use) Managing parameters for HCompressor.
nom.tam.fits.compression.provider.param.quant
(for internal use) Managing parameters for quantization via QuantizeProcessor.
nom.tam.fits.compression.provider.param.rice
(for internal use) Managing parameters for RiceCompressor.
nom.tam.fits.header
Standardized FITS header keywords, as per FITS specification.
nom.tam.fits.header.extra
Various registered conventions for FITS header keywords.
nom.tam.fits.header.hierarch
Support for the registered hierarchical keyword convention.
nom.tam.fits.utilities
A collection of useful classes.
nom.tam.image
Image tiling support.
nom.tam.image.compression
Access compressed image tiles individually.
nom.tam.image.compression.bintable
(for internal use) Compression support for binary tables.
nom.tam.image.compression.hdu
Compressing and decompressing HDUs, for both images and binary tables.
nom.tam.image.compression.tile
(for internal use) Tile compression support for images and tables.
nom.tam.image.compression.tile.mask
(for internal use) Support for blank (null) values in compressed image tiles.
nom.tam.image.tile.operation
Interfaces and base classes for handling image tiles (primarily for internal use) .
nom.tam.image.tile.operation.buffer
(for internal use) Buffering support for image tiles.
nom.tam.util
Various commonly used classes for nom-tam-fits.
nom.tam.util.array
A few classes for copying and iterating over multi-dimensional arrays of all/any types, primarily for internal use.
nom.tam.util.type
(for internal use) FITS 'primitive' element types.
